sentences.en: Administer the salve to the sunburned area with a cotton swab.
sentences.cn: 请用棉药签把药膏敷在晒伤的地方.

sentences.en: Also their shop is very nice with Speed Scroll and healing salve.
sentences.cn: 同时他们的商店有速度卷轴和治疗膏药.

sentences.en: Different sore must have different salve.
Every day mother applied a sweet - smelling salve to my legs.
sentences.cn: 母亲每天把一种有香味的油膏涂在我腿上.

sentences.en: Food for the spirit. And salve for my conscience.
sentences.cn: 这个提议是我精神的食粮, 却是我良知的药膏.

sentences.en: He needed a salve for his conscience.
I give myself treats and justify them to salve my conscience.
sentences.cn: 我常犒劳自己一番，然后找个说辞让自已良心稍安。

sentences.en: It was a sort of salve to her conscience.
sentences.cn: 那对她的良心是一种宽慰.

sentences.en: She paid the repair bill as a salve to her conscience.
sentences.cn: 她付了维修费以减轻内疚感.

sentences.en: The salve will heal slight burns.
sentences.cn: 这种药膏能治疗轻微烧伤.

sentences.en: This is a salve containing menthol.
sentences.cn: 这是一种含有薄荷的药膏。

sentences.en: This salve will help to heal the wound.
sentences.cn: 这种药膏有助于治愈伤口.

sentences.en: This was widely hailed as a further salve for landlords.
sentences.cn: 此举进一步安抚了房主从而受到大面积的赞扬.

sentences.en: Unlike the Rosebud salve , this stuff is actually worth the money.
sentences.cn: 跟玫瑰花蕾膏不一样, 这个更值的买!

sentences.en: We were unable to salve anything from the factory's fire.
sentences.cn: 我们没能从工厂大火中抢出任何东西.

trans.tran_en: a substance that you put on sore skin to make it less painful
if you do something to salve your conscience, you do it to make yourself feel less guilty

trans.tran_cn: <正>使良心得到宽慰，减轻内疚感
